title: Blogging is epic
contents: swagMy name is Poody and I have done some epic stuff. This is the place where you will see reports of such epic stuff.

title: Welcome to Epic Poody Blog
description: Welcome to our new Epic Poody Blog. Give it a read!
contents: Thanks for stopping by and checking out my blog!! I think it is a very epic blog. You will see some epic things here for sure.
